Docs.summary: Represents collection of parameters and their values.

MemberSignature.Value: public T Get<T> (string name);

Docs.typeparam: The type of parameter. only string, int and bool are supported.
Docs.summary: Returns the parameter value in type . The parameter must have the same type as . Currently only string, int and bool are allowed. If the name is not available, it returns an empty string if the parameter is a string, 0 if the parameter is int, and false if the parameter is bool.

Docs.typeparam: The type of parameter. only string, int and bool are supported.
Docs.param: The default value which is returned if the parameter is not available in the collection.
Docs.summary: Returns the parameter value in type . The parameter must have the same type as . Currently only string, int and bool are allowed. If the name is not available, the specified defaultValue is returned.
